scenario_text.value:
Are, are we really going in there? Um, maybe
it’d be best to regroup...

We’re already far past the point of no
return, Shuuji.
It’s okay, Shuuji! I’ll protect you, promise!

Shut up, you waste of space! What the hell
can you do here?!
(Then how does he expect to fight...?)

Are we going? Not going? Just, just hurry up
and decide already!
